name: Neon Burst
description:
Neon Burst is a game developed by one single person (Me!) and it is being developed as a test on developing computer games.
It's a single player game about a spaceship whose mission is to kill all the enemy waves for long as it can!

For now there are 7 upgrades available for the ship (Upgrades/Bullet Modifiers) and 2 kinds of enemies with 4 different spawn colours.

The difficulty isn't really high in the beta because I need more time to create more enemies and manage the waves system! :D
